title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions: Introducing the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, a stunning timepiece that combines style and functionality. This watch features a black sunburst dial with gold-tone and silver-tone accents, a black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents, and luminescent hands and markers for easy reading in any lighting. With a water resistance of 100 meters, this watch is perfect for any adventure, from the boardroom to the beach. The gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with curved and faceted links and a sport foldover closure adds a touch of luxury to this must-have accessory. With chronograph, 24-hour display, and calendar functions, this watch is the perfect blend of style and practicality. Elevate your look with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch.
